description: Creates a policy with the specified attributes for the specified load balancer. Policies are settings that are saved for your load balancer and that can be applied to the listener or the application server, depending on the policy type.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerName
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer.

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer policy to be created. This name must be unique within the set of policies for this load balancer.

parameters.name: PolicyTypeName
parameters.description: The name of the base policy type. To get the list of policy types, use  DescribeLoadBalancerPolicyTypes.

parameters.name: PolicyAttributes
parameters.description: The policy attributes. (dict) --- Information about a policy attribute. AttributeName (string) --- The name of the attribute. AttributeValue (string) --- The value of the attribute.
